# 树的最小表示法

[AcWing-157-树形地铁系统](https://www.acwing.com/problem/content/159/)

## 应用

判定**有根**树是否同构.

## 实现

```cpp
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
string dfs(const string &str, int &idx)
{
    vector<string> a;
    ++ idx;
    while(str[idx] == '0')// 0, 子树
        a.push_back(dfs(str, idx));
    ++ idx;// 1, 跳过
    sort(a.begin(), a.end());
    string res = "0";
    for(auto e : a) res += e;
    res += '1';
    return res;
}
int main()
{
    int T;
    cin >> T;
    while(T --)
    {
        string a, b;
        cin >> a >> b;
        a = '0' + a + '1', b = '0' + b + '1';
        int idx_a = 0, idx_b = 0;
        if(dfs(a, idx_a) == dfs(b, idx_b))
            printf("same\n");
        else
            printf("different\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
```
